title: Hardcode admin principal ID

requirements.text: Replace the placeholder value in `frontend/src/config/constants.ts` with the actual admin principal ID `ci3hz-xset5-ahrcc-nhtdc-kfnzc-34wqe-e2yzj-qk2gl-ygiwy-oc5j5-2ae` for the `ADMIN_PRINCIPAL_ID` constant.
acceptanceCriteria: The Admin Panel nav link in `Layout.tsx` is visible only when logged in as the principal `ci3hz-xset5-ahrcc-nhtdc-kfnzc-34wqe-e2yzj-qk2gl-ygiwy-oc5j5-2ae`
The debug principal ID display on the home page is removed now that the real ID has been captured

constraints: Do not change any backend logic or admin check mechanisms
Do not modify immutable frontend paths (useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui)
nonGoals: Changing the admin check architecture from frontend-only to backend-validated
